actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to limit civil service disciplinary actions in certain cases involving the failure of an employee to report as directed for the service of process.

summary.text: Prohibits the taking of civil service disciplinary action against any civil service employee who refuses to comply with directives to report to any place for the service of State or local process in connection with a claim against such employee for taxes allegedly owed such State or unit of local government.

titles.title: A bill to limit civil service disciplinary actions in certain cases involving the failure of an employee to report as directed for the service of process.
